name: Rubeus Hack Tool
description: Detects the execution of the hacktool Rubeus via PE information of command line parameters
query: (process.executable:/.*\\[Rr][Uu][Bb][Ee][Uu][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR process.pe.original_file_name:/[Rr][Uu][Bb][Ee][Uu][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR process.command_line:(/.*\ [Aa][Ss][Rr][Ee][Pp][Rr][Oo][Aa][Ss][Tt]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp]\ \/[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\:[Kk][Rr][Bb][Tt][Gg][Tt]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Kk][Ee][Rr][Bb][Ee][Rr][Oo][Aa][Ss][Tt]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Cc][Rr][Ee][Aa][Tt][Ee][Nn][Ee][Tt][Oo][Nn][Ll][Yy]\ \/[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\:.*/ OR /.*\ [Pp][Tt][Tt]\ \/[Tt][Ii][Cc][Kk][Ee][Tt]\:.*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ii][Mm][Pp][Ee][Rr][Ss][Oo][Nn][Aa][Tt][Ee][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr]\:.*/ OR /.*\ [Rr][Ee][Nn][Ee][Ww]\ \/[Tt][Ii][Cc][Kk][Ee][Tt]\:.*/ OR /.*\ [Aa][Ss][Kk][Tt][Gg][Tt]\ \/[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr]\:.*/ OR /.*\ [Hh][Aa][Rr][Vv][Ee][Ss][Tt]\ \/[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Vv][Aa][Ll]\:.*/ OR /.*\ [Ss]4[Uu]\ \/[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr]\:.*/ OR /.*\ [Ss]4[Uu]\ \/[Tt][Ii][Cc][Kk][Ee][Tt]\:.*/ OR /.*\ [Hh][Aa][Ss][Hh]\ \/[Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\:.*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\Rubeus.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:Rubeus.exe OR process.command_line:(*\ asreproast\ * OR *\ dump\ \/service\:krbtgt\ * OR *\ kerberoast\ * OR *\ createnetonly\ \/program\:* OR *\ ptt\ \/ticket\:* OR *\ \/impersonateuser\:* OR *\ renew\ \/ticket\:* OR *\ asktgt\ \/user\:* OR *\ harvest\ \/interval\:* OR *\ s4u\ \/user\:* OR *\ s4u\ \/ticket\:* OR *\ hash\ \/password\:*))`
